common_phrases_spanish.english: What have you been up to?

common_phrases_spanish.spanish: Hace mucho que no te veo, ¿cómo has estado?
common_phrases_spanish.english: I haven't seen you in a while, how have you been?
It's so nice to see you!

common_phrases_spanish.spanish: ¿Tienes planes para el fin de semana?
common_phrases_spanish.english: Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Have you seen any good movies lately?
What do you think of the weather today?

common_phrases_spanish.spanish: ¿Te gustaría tomar un café un día de estos?
common_phrases_spanish.english: Would you like to grab a coffee sometime?
Do you have anything interesting to share?
